name: The Fool's Errand (itch)
description:
YOU FOOL

YOU TRY TO GO AFTER THE WORLD?

EAT THE SUN?

====

Some clarification on the game's goal:

- Entering the Door to The World / Door 21 in the first room is how you win, you go into it by finding the Key to The World

- Periodically, the destination of each door will be increased by one, you gotta find a route through that labyrinth back to where you started

- Following the colored markings on the floor can lead you to powerups (provided you adjust for any room shifts)

====

The Fool's Errand is a game where you, The Fool, embark through ominously purple hallways and seek out The World! On your way, you will stumble across helpful items that let you control and look into the machinations of these accursed hallways!
